name: BAR OLD PAL VR: PROLOGUE
description:
VR BARTENDING SIMULATOR, 'BAR OLD PAL VR : PROLOGUE'

"BAR OLD PAL VR: PROLOGUE" is a VR bartending simulation game genre and is a VR project developed through Unreal Engine 5 to enjoy story lines related to the protagonist while focusing on experiencing bartending directly based on the official recipe of the International Bartender Association (IBA).

Get a special experience of making your own cocktails through realistic interaction and become a bartender at BAR OLD PAL.

Experience various cocktail-making techniques firsthand.

Try manufacturing cocktails using various cocktail manufacturing techniques such as stir, shaking, and mixing in VR environment.
The closer to the correct recipe, the higher the customer's rating on the cocktail.

If you're not familiar with the VR play environment, take some time to adapt to VR controls and gameplay through the tutorial map we've prepared.
After entering the "BAR OLD PAL", you will be able to play easily.

Experience realistic interaction.

Experience realistic interactions like making real cocktails in VR, and make various real cocktails such as Gin lime and Daikiri through recipes on tablets.

Maybe you'll find 'HIDDEN RECIPES' on the play that aren't released on the tablet.

Listen to the storyline about the main character.

Brandon, the main character who inherited the old bar, Old Pal, according to his father's will,
On the first day of his visit to the bar to practice cocktail making, Brandon faces a suspicious customer...

Enjoy the main story of Brandon through the storyline prepared for the 3rd day.

If you enjoyed playing "BAR OLD PAL VR: PROLOGUE", please look forward to the additional recipes and stories that will be developed in the future.

Requirements

'BAR OLD PAL VR: PROLOGUE' was developed on the premise of a VR play environment.
To enjoy 'BAR OLD PAL VR: PROLOGUE', you must have a Meta Quest (Oculus Quest) device ready.
Although it runs on a typical PC platform, it is a device for testing and unfortunately, it cannot guarantee a normal play.
